name: Loaded to the Muzzle
description: Alex has showed up to a 20s themed party early [in modern times] - despite being exhausted- to help a dear friend Jillian set up and clean up in preparation for the guests. After finishing the cleaning, and choosing whether or not to drink, Alex takes a nap, and upon the entering a dream finds themself in REAL 1920s Boston. The rest of the game follows Alex’s attempt to navigate this 1920s environment in an attempt to get home, facing choices and obstacles such as choosing a pair of 20s clothing of the era, locating a secret password for entrance into a local pub, and thwarting the suspicion and ill-will of a local and very dangerous gang of mobsters.
